ygData.subject: Re: First Time Research Results
ygData.msgSnippet: About that research not raising..I read this on the Mytherian Tower research site. Remember how you could only put ONE point in at lvl 16 well once you hit lvl
ygData.messageBody:
About that research not raising..I read this on the Mytherian Tower
research site. Remember how you could only put ONE point in at lvl 16 well
once you hit lvl 20 (something to do with that spell circle) you can then
pump many more points into it from your guildmaster. And then each level
thereafter. My guess would be you will get no increase until this magical
level.

~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohtarin~~
--The Ravenwalker--
High elven wizard of the 18th level on Xegony.


Donald Taber wrote:

> From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
> Well, I made level 16 last night so I decided to try research for the
> first time. I had been collecting runes for a while, so I had a sizable
> collection in the bank. Just thought I would share the results.
>
> Project Lightning - I had enough runes to attempt this spell twice. The
> first attempt failed, the second one succeeded! My first spell! Ok, 1
> out of 2 is not bad.
>
> Pillar of Fire - Well, I only had one rune of nagafen, so I could only
> attempt this one once. It failed. Now at 1 of 3 attempts.
>
> Identify - Now I had heard this spell was useless, but I figured I still
> wanted to play with research. I had enough runes to attempt this spell
> 4 times. I had 3 failures and a success on the fourth try.
>
> Total success rate: 2 out of 7 tries.
>
> I'm not sure if the research skill ever goes up, mine did not. Does the
> skill raise?
>
> See you all onlinge,
>
> Soren
> 16th Level
> Wizard
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking to expand your world?
> http://www.onelist.com
> ONElist has over 150,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
